specifyNameOfCafe: What is the name of the place?
specifyDescription: Short description if needed (Markdown syntax is supported)
specifyLocation: Start typing the name of the place or its address...
twitterValidationError: Specify a twitter account name, with preceeding @ or without, e.g. @espressolocator
facebookValidationError: Make sure you specified a Facebook full URL pointing to account name
instagramValidationError: Specify just Instagram account name without preceeding @
please_check_guidelines: Please make sure you read posting guidelines before suggesting your first location.
nearest_view: Order by proximity to the current location
you_need_to_enable_geolocation: Can't determine your location, Geolocation needs to be enabled in browser for full functionality.
sorry_you_cannot_edit_this_post: Sorry, you cannot edit this locaton.
most_popular_posts: The most popular locations right now.
day_by_day_view: The most popular locations of each day.
a_new_comment_on_your_post: A new comment on your location
this_link_has_already_been_posted: This link has already been used in different location
sorry_we_couldnt_find_any_posts: Sorry, we couldn't find any locations.
note_this_post_is_still_pending_so_it_ha: Note: this location is still pending so it has no submission timestamp yet.
thanks_your_post_is_awaiting_approval: Thanks, your location is awaiting approval.
the_top_5_posts_of_each_day: The top 5 locations of each day.
sorry_no_posts_for_today: Sorry, no location have been posted today
sorry_no_posts_for: Sorry, no location have been posted for
posts_of_a_single_day: The locations of a single day.
delete_users_posts_comments_as_well: Delete user's locations and comments as well?
